title: karuNAkaranE varanE
sahitya:
karuNAkaranE varanE sharaNam gati vErillai


anupallavi

  aruNAcalanE shivanE abhayam abhayam anjal aLittemai Adari appanE


caraNam    ghOra rAkSasargaL guNDu bIrangigaLAL konr-ivvulagamellAm venru naDunguginrAr
bhArata dEshattaik-kAttiDuvAi emmaip-parivuDan kaDaikkaNNAl pArttiDuvAi appA
